subject: Phase 3-4: JavaScript全面改修
description:
detect.htmlのJavaScript全面改修:
- 削除: _expandedSteps, _stepRequestIds, renderSummary, toggleStepDetail, reloadStepDetail, renderStepDetail
- 追加: _checkResults, _registeredData, CHECK_ID_MAP, checkAuthStatus(), captureAuth(), runAutoCheck(), runAllChecks(), updateCheckProgress()
- 変更: renderMatrix → チェック結果テーブル化, loadSession → check API統合, pollSession → renderSummary呼出削除
